_sText:
One jump strafe based gameplay made for legit normal settings (that means stamina scroll for the uninitiated). It is intended to be played on 100 tick, sv_airaccelerate 100, fps_max 300, sv_gravity 800 and no scout / 250 run speed. To experience the map how it was meant to be played, visit [http://steamcommunity.com/groups/_strafe](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/_strafe "http://steamcommunity.com/groups/_strafe") for a list of legit normal servers.

Originally designed to be a bonus stage for badges3, but didn't fit. Also contains a short speedrun bonus map.


<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Y3NRt-b_baQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
